title: What is the best paying country for part-time students while I am studying? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no direct answer to this question. It’s about how much you can save while working as part time when you are studying the answer is very less. You hardly make enough to survive and may be enough that enjoy little bit on weekends on your backyard. there are more articles on student life in abroad on Edflight : Student Career Guidance | International student recruitment which you can read. They are also best education counselors for study abroad, you can take their services also.

It depends on the type of the job you apply and your experience as well. Your question is quite broad. And keep in mind that a country which pay high for a part time job can also charge you higher for your living expense. You end up saving not much though. ANW, I suggest you start looking for countries with high living expenses such as Northern European countries or the States.
